question: Identify the option showing the correct labelling for p, q, r and s with reference to the conducting system of the human heart.
images/4d3e2f1g-0h9i-8j7k-6l5m-4n3o2p1q0r9s.png
choices: p-Bundle of His, q-SAN, r-Interventricular septum, s-AVN
p-SAN, q-AVN, r-Bundle of His, s-Interventicular septum
p-Interventicular septum, q-AVN, r-Bundle of His, s-SAN
p-AVN, q-SAN, r-Interventicular septum, s-Bundle of His
explanation: Based on the standard diagram of the heart's conducting system: 'p' represents the Sino-atrial Node (SAN), 'q' represents the Atrio-ventricular Node (AVN), 'r' represents the Bundle of His, and 's' represents the Purkinje fibers/Interventricular septum area.
